Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delay following an earlier mechanical problem at 54th/Cermak. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delay following an earlier mechanical problem at 54th/Cermak.

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Service Delayed near Irving Park
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are standing near Irving Park due to fire department activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are standing near Irving Park due to fire department activity. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 California, #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Homan and Division
ShortDescription: Northbound 94 California and 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Division, Cicero, Fullerton and Homan due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California and #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Division, Cicero, Fullerton and Homan due to street blockage near Homan and Division.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
